basic_information.scholarship_name: LeRoy Long IV Graduate Student Research Award for History and Geography

description: This scholarship was established by College of Liberal Arts Advocacy Council Member Hugh Long. It provides funds for graduate students to perform archival research in Oklahoma, the United States, or abroad. Eligibility Requirements Student of the History & Geography Department Graduate student performing original archival research

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
